content.question: After a time <math alttext="delta t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Î”</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> the magnetic field is kept constant. To induce a counterclockwise current in the loop while the field is constant, in what direction should the loop be moved?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
